department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Printing Service Contract for the Department of National Defence
description: This contract is for printing services for the Department of National Defence. It includes printing of quarterly editions of the Canadian Military Journal in both English and French, with an optional special edition each year.
full_summary:
# Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Businesses (PSIB) - Printing Services

## Tender Details
*   **Tender Reference:** WS4074066271-Doc4075623381
*   **Posting Date:** June 28, 2023
*   **Closing Date:** July 11, 2023, at 02:00 PM ET
*   **Contract Start Date:** September 21, 2023

## Procurement Overview
This tender is announced under the federal government's Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Businesses (PSIB) program. Suppliers who wish to participate must confirm their Indigenous business status and commit to adhering to the requirements outlined in the program guidelines.

## Requirements
The Department of National Defence requires a Contractor to print the quarterly editions of the Canadian Military Journal in both English and French. Additionally, there is an option to print a special edition every year. The contract is set for one year, with the possibility of extending it by two additional one-year periods.

## Contract Details
*   **Contract Type:** Printing Services
*   **Duration:** One year with possible extensions of two additional one-year periods
*   **Language:** English and French
*   **Location:** Kingston, Ontario

## Trade and Revenue Agreements
This procurement is covered under the following trade agreements:
*   **Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)**
*   **Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement**
*   **Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)**
*   **World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)**
*   **Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)**
